name:
New Style Boutique™ 2 - 
Fashion Forward: Update
formal_name:
New Style Boutique™ 2 - 
Fashion Forward: Update
description:
An update for "Nintendo presents:
New Style Boutique™ 2 - Fashion
Forward" is now available from
Nintendo eShop.

All customers who own a copy of
“Nintendo presents:
New Style Boutique™ 2 - Fashion
Forward” should download the update.

This will update the software to
Version 1.1.0 with the following
amendments:

- Various bugs have been fixed in
order to provide a smoother gaming
experience.

• Once the update has been
downloaded, it will be installed
automatically.

We apologize for any inconvenience
caused, and recommend downloading
this update to ensure a smooth game
experience.
